entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:17 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -20.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
